tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fish_species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(50),
    growth_rate DECIMAL,
    feeding_schedule VARCHAR(100),
    breeding_habits VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE FishSpecies (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    growth_rate FLOAT,
    feeding_schedule TEXT,
    breeding_habits TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE AquacultureManagement (
    management_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    feeding_frequency VARCHAR(50),
    temperature_range VARCHAR(50),
    CONSTRAINT fk_species_id FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES FishSpecies(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FishSpecies (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    growth_rate DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    feeding_schedule TEXT,
    breeding_habits TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FishSpecies (
 species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 growth_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
 feeding_schedule VARCHAR(100),
 breeding_habits VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TankDetails (
 tank_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tank_size DECIMAL(8,2),
 water_temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
 water_ph DECIMAL(3,1),
 tank_location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS FeedingRecords (
 record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_id INT,
 feeding_date DATE,
 feeding_quantity DECIMAL(6,2),
 FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES FishSpecies(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS BreedingRecords (
 record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_id INT,
 breeding_date DATE,
 offspring_quantity INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES FishSpecies(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TankOccupancy (
 occupancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 tank_id INT,
 species_id INT,
 occupancy_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (tank_id) REFERENCES TankDetails(tank_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES FishSpecies(species_id)
);
